title: Meat Sauce
directions: Combine ground beef, onion, garlic, and Italian sausage in a pan. Cook until the meat is browned and onions are clear.
Combine tomato sauce, bay leaves, the oregano, and the Italian seasoning in a large pot. Bring to a simmer.
Drain the meat and combine with sauce.
Bring to a light boil, cover, and let sit while you prepare the pasta.
Combine the pasta and the sauce.
ingredients: 1 Table spoon or so of Italian seasoning
A couple couple shakes of oregano
